name: Devil's Door
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DEVIL'S DOOR

A horror drama visual novel set in the countryside town of Marbrooke.

An ode to classic horror films, tropes, and the good ole' spirit of Halloween.

Created by solo developer, Yamyolks for the Spooktober VN Jam.

Edited by @rcmvoice

Partially Voiced by All-Star Cast :

Amber Barlie @AmberTheVAWolf

https://www.amberthevawolf.com/

Rebecca Chiara Marano @rcmvoice

https://www.rcmvoice.com/

Megan Youmans @MeganYoumansVA

Business : Megan.r.youmans@gmail.com

Josh Portillo @josh_saitogami

https://joshportillo65.wixsite.com/website

Vincent Fabbri @Vincent_Fabbri

Business: vfabbrivo@gmail.com

Elissa Park @AdoxTalks

https://www.adoxtalks.com/

Abigail Adair @ AbicadabriVA

https://www.youtube.com/c/AbimationsMallowCave

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THANK YOU EVERYONE FOR YOUR INTEREST IN OUR GAME!
Add it to your collections and follow along!

Playable Soon!
